question: Which of the following kings was the son of Prithvisena I?
explanation: Rudrasena II was the grandson of founder of the Vakataka Nandivardhana branch Rudrasena I, and son of Prithvisena. He ruled only for a period of five years and died prematurely, leaving behind three minor sons Divakarasena, Damodarasena, and Pravarasena.
